OOC: Weight cant be standing next to DrillBit, he is already out of the
cave.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit saw some more shots heading for the base. He turns to KitKat.
"This dont look so good, we are getting clobbered." He said.
He alligned his gattaling gun with the head of the bot who had fallen
near the base opening, and opened fire.
